LanguageData.BodyModificationEnthusiast.degreeDatas.b: Some people cook lavish meals for a creative outlet, some write symphonies, some paint or sculpt masterpieces. [PAWN_nameDef] feels the ultimate form of self expression comes from visual skin alterations.
LanguageData.BodyModificationPurist.degreeDatas.bodym: [PAWN_nameDef] feels that the body is ment to be kept as it is and has a great dislike of any esthetical modifications.
